nodes.text: Milk Run is an article featured in Polyhedron 83. It was written by Sterling Hershey and was a rules supplement for the West End Games Star Wars D6 system. Like all supplements printed in Polyhedron prior to 2002, the article is considered ambiguously canon.
The scenario was originally run by the RPGA at the Gen Con '91 convention, two years prior to its publication in Polyhedron.
